name: Rabbit Jumper
description:
I like pixel games, I like rabbits and I like endless runner. So here you have a pixel bunny endless runner. Have fun

  • for macOS, Web, Linux and Windows (Android is planned)
  • ideal for the road
  • simple control (press space :D)

I developed the game in a few hours. I use the project to learn and to gain more experience with Unity.

----------------------------------------------------------------------

Description: Our little bunny is hungry. Help him eat the carrots, avoiding the spikes. Thanks to video game logic, he can jump in the air indefinitely. Sounds easy right? He especially likes the big carrots and gives you 10 points for each one. But watch out for the rotating spikes that hurt our rabbit.

----------------------------------------------------------------------

If you're interested in seeing how to develop such a small game ... I plan to upload all code and assets to GITHUB. As soon as I did that, I will publish the link to the project here.

!! Attention: So far, only the macOS and web version has been sufficiently tested. If bugs occur when running on Linux or Windows, please report them. Many thanks for the support.
